short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily boost your spelling skills by adding misspelled words to your list and practicing them effectively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: Spelly is in development and is becoming better every week (latest update: Oct 28, 2024).

Spelly is a powerful tool designed to boost your spelling skills. With the Spelly Chrome extension, you can easily add words to your personalized spelling list directly from your browser. Just highlight a word, right-click, and select "Add to Spelly" to start tracking and practicing commonly misspelled words.

The extension works seamlessly with the Spelly web app, where you can manage your word list, monitor your progress, and practice essential words. Visit the Spelly Web App to discover more features and enhance your learning experience.

Give it a try and elevate your spelling skills!
